--- Testing vfmadd231ps (Fused Multiply-Add of Packed Single-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---

[128-bit test]
Input a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Input c: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result: 0.600000 3.200000 7.800000 14.400000 
Expected: 0.600000 3.200000 7.800000 14.400000 

[256-bit test]
Input a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 5.500000 6.500000 7.500000 
Input c: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 0.500000 0.600000 0.700000 0.800000 
Result: 0.600000 3.200000 7.800000 14.400000 23.000000 33.599998 46.200001 60.799999 
Expected: 0.600000 3.200000 7.800000 14.400000 23.000000 33.599998 46.200001 60.799999 

[Special values test]
Special a: 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0x7FC00000 0x00000000 0x3F800000 0xBF800000 0x7E967699 0xFE967699 
Special b: 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x40000000 0x40000000 
Special c: 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 
Special result: 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0x7FC00000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x7F167699 0xFF167699 

[Rounding modes test]
Rounding mode 0:
MXCSR: 0x00001FA0
  [ ] DAZ - Denormals Are Zero: 0
  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
Flags: I:0 D:0 Z:0 O:0 U:0 P:1
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 5.600000 6.600000 7.600000 8.600000 
Rounding mode 1:
MXCSR: 0x00003FA0
  [ ] DAZ - Denormals Are Zero: 0
  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
Flags: I:0 D:0 Z:0 O:0 U:0 P:1
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 5.600000 6.600000 7.600000 8.599999 
Rounding mode 2:
MXCSR: 0x00005FA0
  [ ] DAZ - Denormals Are Zero: 0
  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
Flags: I:0 D:0 Z:0 O:0 U:0 P:1
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 5.600000 6.600000 7.600000 8.600000 
Rounding mode 3:
MXCSR: 0x00007FA0
  [ ] DAZ - Denormals Are Zero: 0
  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
Flags: I:0 D:0 Z:0 O:0 U:0 P:1
Result: 1.600000 2.600000 3.600000 4.600000 5.600000 6.600000 7.600000 8.599999
